QuestData.Title: Logistical Nightmare
QuestData.Description: Commander, I am afraid I have... troubling... news.$B$BThese saberon followed our encampment from Gorgrond, and have been stealing our supplies, ransacking our ledgers, and slaughtering our peons!$B$BI hate to ask of your time to deal with the matter, but all of our men are stationed guarding the camp from any further raids. We desperately need those supplies so we may enact your will!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve $1oa Sacks of Supplies and $2oa Garrison Records.
QuestData.RewardText: I never doubted you for a moment. You are truly a commander of the people.$B$BLok'tar ogar!
